text: nihsandeh ve log, jinake praan farishte nikaalate hain, is dasha mein ki ve apane oopar (kufr ke desh mein rahakar) atyaachaar karane vaale hon, to unase kahate hain, tum kis cheez mein the? ve kahate hain ki ham dharatee mein vivash the. tab farishte kahate hain, kya allaah kee dharatee vistrt nahin thee ki tum usamen hijarat kar[1] jaate? to inheen ka aavaas narak hai aur vah kya hee bura sthaan hai
